mapper.sql: ID, CUSTOMER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, APPLY_QUOTA, FINAL_APPROVAL, ACTUAL_QUOTE, TEMPORARY_QUOTA, CASH_ADVANCE_PROPORTION, CARD_STATUS, ACCOUNT_STATUS, BILLING_DATE, REPAYMENT_AGREEMENT, AUTOMATIC_REPAYMENT_AGREEMENT, CUSTOMER_RISK_RATING, AGING, DEBIT_WAY, REPAYMENT_CARD_NUMBER, STATUS
mapper.select:
select count(*) from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO t where 1=1
AND t.customer_id=#{customerId}
mapper.insert: insert into CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO (ID, CUSTOMER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, APPLY_QUOTA, FINAL_APPROVAL, ACTUAL_QUOTE, TEMPORARY_QUOTA, CASH_ADVANCE_PROPORTION, CARD_STATUS, ACCOUNT_STATUS, BILLING_DATE, REPAYMENT_AGREEMENT, AUTOMATIC_REPAYMENT_AGREEMENT, CUSTOMER_RISK_RATING, AGING, DEBIT_WAY, REPAYMENT_CARD_NUMBER, STATUS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalApproval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualQuote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temporaryQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashAdvanceProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repaymentAgreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{automaticRepaymentAgreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerRiskRating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aging,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{debitWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repaymentCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_QUOTA = #{applyQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_APPROVAL = #{finalApproval,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTUAL_QUOTE = #{actualQuote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEMPORARY_QUOTA = #{temporaryQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASH_ADVANCE_PROPORTION = #{cashAdvanceProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_STATUS = #{cardStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCOUNT_STATUS = #{accountStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILLING_DATE = #{billingDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPAYMENT_AGREEMENT = #{repaymentAgreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTOMATIC_REPAYMENT_AGREEMENT = #{automaticRepaymentAgreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_RISK_RATING = #{customerRiskRating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGING = #{aging,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEBIT_WAY = #{debitWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPAYMENT_CARD_NUMBER = #{repaymentCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO set CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_QUOTA = #{applyQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINAL_APPROVAL = #{finalApproval,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTUAL_QUOTE = #{actualQuote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPORARY_QUOTA = #{temporaryQuota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASH_ADVANCE_PROPORTION = #{cashAdvanceProportion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_STATUS = #{cardStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_STATUS = #{accountStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLING_DATE = #{billingDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAYMENT_AGREEMENT = #{repaymentAgreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTOMATIC_REPAYMENT_AGREEMENT = #{automaticRepaymentAgreement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_RISK_RATING = #{customerRiskRating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGING = #{aging,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEBIT_WAY = #{debitWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPAYMENT_CARD_NUMBER = #{repaymentCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
